# Functions

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

From R4DS and the Solution book for R4DS:

```{r}
x <- c(1:10, rep(NA,3)) 

cV <- function(x){
  sd(x, na.rm = TRUE)/mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
}

xVar <- function(x) {
  n <- length(x[!is.na(x)])
  m <- mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
  sq_err <- (x - m)^2
  sum(sq_err, na.rm = TRUE) / (n - 1)
}
```
